title: 约会
topic: 约人、请客 / Invitations, Dating, Meeting Up

script.text: 对话一：小黑约王崩 (Xiao Hei Invites Wang Beng)
script.en: Dialogue 1: 小黑 invites 王崩.

script.zh: 学校附近开了一家新的奶茶店。听说不错。想不想去看看？
script.en: A new boba shop opened near campus. Heard it's good. Wanna check it out?

script.zh: 奶茶？好啊。说到奶茶——你知道台湾有一个地方叫公馆吗？台大旁边有一家奶茶店开了1987年了——
script.en: Boba? Sure. Speaking of boba -- do you know there's a place in Taiwan called Gongguan? There's a boba shop near NTU that's been open since 1987--

script.zh: 我问的是这里。这个校区。明天。
script.en: I'm asking about here. This campus. Tomorrow.

script.zh: 对对。明天可以。除非台湾留学生会那天有活动——
script.en: Right right. Tomorrow works. Unless the Taiwanese student association has something that day--
Nothing. So is that a yes?
...Let me check my schedule and get back to you.

script.text: 她走了。她知道他不会看什么schedule。
script.en: She walks away. She knows he's not going to check any schedule.

script.text: 对话二：矮中约小李 (Ai Zhong Invites Xiao Li)
script.en: Dialogue 2: 矮中 invites 小李.

script.zh: 小李！今晚想不想一起吃饭？我发现了一家超好吃的火锅——
script.en: 小李! Wanna grab dinner tonight? I found this amazing hot pot place--

script.zh: 我说好啊。反正没别的事。
script.en: I said sure. Got nothing else going on anyway.

script.zh: 好好好！那我发你地址——七点？
script.en: Nice nice nice! I'll send you the address -- seven?

script.text: 对话三：火锅 (The Hot Pot Dinner)

script.en: So... do you like hot pot?
Their butter broth base is seriously--

script.zh: 哦。那……你觉得中国怎么样？
script.en: Oh. So... what do you think of China?

script.zh: 不是。我就是不太爱说话。
script.en: No. I just don't really like talking.

script.text: 他们AA了。他送她回宿舍。她说"谢谢，bye"就进去了。他站在宿舍楼下面一分钟，觉得自己比几个月来任何时候都矮。
script.en: They split the bill. He walks her back to the dorm. She says "thanks, bye" and goes inside. He stands outside the dorm building for a minute, feeling shorter than he has in months.

script.text: 对话四：女生群聊 — 当晚
script.en: Dialogue 4: Girls' group chat -- that night.

script.zh: 等一下你跟矮中去吃饭了？？
script.en: Wait you went to dinner with 矮中??

script.zh: 他好紧张。平时不是很吵吗？突然就不说话了。
script.en: He was so nervous. Isn't he usually super loud? Suddenly he had nothing to say.
[Read this message. Didn't reply for three minutes]

script.zh: 他喜欢所有的中国女生。我不特别。我只是……在他面前而已。
script.en: He likes every Chinese girl. I'm not special. I'm just... there.

script.text: 清清放下手机。她应该觉得relieved——小李不感兴趣。但她感受到的不是relief。是更重的东西。他请小李吃饭了。没有请她。
script.en: 清清 puts down her phone. She should feel relieved -- 小李 isn't interested. But what she feels isn't relief. It's something heavier. He asked 小李 to dinner. Not her.

grammarNotes.title: 想 + verb (want to)
grammarNotes.body:
你想不想一起吃饭？= Do you want to eat together?
我想去看看。= I want to go check it out.

grammarNotes.title: 吧 (suggestion / softener)
grammarNotes.body:
去看看吧。= Let's go check it out.
面馆吧。= The noodle shop, then.
好吧。= Fine / Alright.

grammarNotes.title: 请 — to treat / to invite
grammarNotes.body:
我请你吃饭。= I'll treat you to dinner.
请客 = to pay for someone's meal
别客气，我请。= Don't be polite, my treat.
Note: In China, friends often fight over the bill (抢着买单). Splitting evenly (AA制) is more of a Western habit.

grammarNotes.title: 还是 — or (in questions)
grammarNotes.body:
你喝茶还是咖啡？= Do you want tea or coffee?
去火锅还是烧烤？= Hotpot or BBQ?
Note: 还是 = 'or' in questions. 或者 = 'or' in statements.

grammarNotes.title: 一起 — together
grammarNotes.body:
我们一起去吧。= Let's go together.
一起吃饭？= Eat together?
Note: 一起 goes before the verb. Very common in casual invitations.
